name: AiTrillion Engage
author: AiTrillion

sections.description:
Revolutionize customer engagement with AiTrillion Engage’s seamless features like Email Marketing, SMS Marketing, Smart popups, Website Reviews, Announcement Bars, Customer Timeline, and Analytics. Leverage smart SMS campaigns with advanced segmentation, automate communications via Workflow Automation, and create detailed customer segments for personalized updates. Enhance engagement with timely web push notifications, popups, and announcement bars, while gaining insights into visitor behaviour with AiTrillion Engage. Effortlessly enhance your marketing strategy and connect with your audience.

Features Overview

  • Transform Email & SMS Marketing with AiTrillion Engage.
  • Automate your communications Workflow Automation (Email, SMS & Web Push).
  • Analyze csutomer activity on websites wtih powerful Customer Timeline and Analytics.
  • Engage your audience with Web Push Notifications.
  • Gather site reviews to build trust.
  • Grow your email list with newsletter popups.
  • Display important offers and notifications on your site with announcement bars and more…
  • In-depth visitor behaviour insights with AiTrillion Engage.

For more information about the AiTrillion Engage features, please visit AiTrillion Engage.

You can review the service’s terms of use at Terms of Service and the privacy policy at Privacy Policy.
sections.installation:
1. Upload aitrillion-engage.zip into plugins folder.
  2. Activate Aitrillion Engage plugin.
  3. Go to AiTrillion Engage -> Settings and update API key and password (You will find this under your AiTrillion account dashboard)
sections.faq:
How to start using AiTrillion Engage?

You can start by setting up the first module and making it live. Please follow the fundamental steps and start immediately.
Check the help doc for detailed steps.
